questions.quote: So--ah, Kramer. Why'd you ask me out to dinner?  An' why Pomodoro?
Elaine, c'mon. Would you just make the call?  Please, make the call.
What are you talking about? That marriage ended six months ago. She's already remarried.
I can get you a spot right behind him. He has got a great butt.
No, wait a minute, Newman! You can't let this dream die. You moving away is my dream too!
She's this crazy woman who is convinced that my germs make her sick.
She wants to keep it quiet. She... thinks we have a real future together.
Quiet, you'll get yours in a minute. Kruger, you couldn't smooth a silk sheet if you had a hot date with a babe.. I lost my train of thought.
Ho, ho, ho! He's got a live one. He's just reeling his big fish in!
Worse. We made out at the table like our plane was going down!
